thread.title: Emmi upgrades earnings forecast after beating first half expectations
thread.title_full: Emmi upgrades earnings forecast after beating first half expectations

title: Emmi upgrades earnings forecast after beating first half expectations
text:
18 Aug 2015 | By Alec Mattinson 
Swiss food group Emmi beat revenue expectations in the first half of 2015 despite sales slipping 3.8% to CHF1.56bn. Available to members only
